title: 什么插件能控制每日收购数量
author: God灬sun
txt_content: 如题，有没有一个插件能够做到控制每天每个玩家一个物品的收购数量

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
首先要有bossshopPro这个是付费的插件,再要安装一个附属插件设置菜单的例子里面有的
原贴例子# This is an example shop, demonstrating the LimitedUses addon
ShopName: LimitedUses
DisplayName: '&4&lLimitedUses'
Command: limiteduses
signs:
  text: '[LimitedUses]'
  NeedPermissionToCreateSign: true
shop:
  Diamond:
    MenuItem:
    - type:DIAMOND
    - amount:1
    - name:&dDiamond
    - 'lore1:&8You can purchase one diamond every ten hours.'
    - 'lore2:&cPrice: %price%.'
    RewardType: ITEM
    Reward:
    - - amount:1
      - type:DIAMOND
    PriceType: MONEY
    Price: 150.0
    Message: '&eYou bought a diamond for %price%.'
    ExtraPermission: ''
    InventoryLocation: 1
    Condition:
    - type:cooldown
    - over:36000
  Diamond_blocked:
    MenuItem:
    - type:BARRIER
    - amount:1
    - name:&f&lOut of stock
    RewardType: NOTHING
    PriceType: NOTHING
    Message: '&8Come back in %cooldown_LimitedUses:Diamond%.'
    ExtraPermission: ''
    InventoryLocation: 1
  StarterKit:
    MenuItem:
    - type:WOOD_PICKAXE
    - amount:1
    - name:&fStarter Kit
    - 'lore:&8Click to receive your starter kit.'
    RewardType: ITEM
    Reward:
    - - amount:1
      - type:WOOD_PICKAXE
    - - amount:1
      - type:WOOD_SPADE
    - - amount:1
      - type:WOOD_AXE
    - - amount:1
      - type:WOOD_SWORD
    - - amount:16
      - type:TORCH
    - - amount:32
      - id:4
    PriceType: NOTHING
    Message: '&eReceived your starter kit.'
    ExtraPermission: ''
    InventoryLocation: 2
    Condition:
    - type:uses
    - under:1
  StarterKit_blocked:
    MenuItem:
    - type:BARRIER
    - amount:1
    - name:&f&lOut of stock
    - 'lore:&cYou have already taken your starter kit.'
    RewardType: NOTHING
    PriceType: NOTHING
    Message: ''
    ExtraPermission: ''
    InventoryLocation: 2
  Obsidian:
    MenuItem:
    - type:OBSIDIAN
    - amount:64
    - name:&964 Obsidian
    - 'lore1:&cPrice: 10000 Money'
    - 'lore2:&cBought: &b%uses%&c/&b15 &ctimes.'
    RewardType: ITEM
    Reward:
    - - type:OBSIDIAN
      - amount:64
    PriceType: MONEY
    Price: 10000
    Message: '&eYou bought %reward%! Money left: &c%left%'
    ExtraPermission: ''
    InventoryLocation: 3
    Condition:
    - type:uses
    - under:15复制代码

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
那也就一些菜单插件可以了吧你用ess的/sell是不行
BossShopPro有个附属插件限制购买次数。你可以调成花费物品来获得金钱的形式
[综合]BossShop —— 强大的自定义GUI菜单插件[1.7-1.12]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-726510-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

请问如何使用呢。谢谢
